original_text: Then Samuel took a flask of oil and poured it on his head and kissed him and said, “Has not the Lord anointed you to be prince over his people Israel? And you shall reign over the people of the Lord and you will save them from the hand of their surrounding enemies. And this shall be the sign to you that the Lord has anointed you to be prince over his heritage.
korean_text: 이에 사무엘이 기름병을 가져다가 사울의 머리에 붓고 입맞추며 이르되 여호와께서 네게 기름을 부으사 그의 기업의 지도자로 삼지 아니하셨느냐

sentences.original_text: Then Samuel took a flask of oil
and poured it on his head
to be prince over his people Israel?
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 백성 이스라엘의 통치자로 삼으시지 않았습니까?

sentences.original_text: And you shall reign over the people of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 주의 백성을 다스릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and you will save them from the hand of their surrounding enemies.
sentences.korean_translation: 사방에 있는 원수들의 손에서 그들을 구원할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: And this shall be the sign to you
that the Lord has anointed you
to be prince over his heritage.”
